channel.title: CVE Feed for JUNG -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JUNG -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-20082|2024-08-05T21:45:25.349Z -- jung -- smart%20visu%20server
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found in JUNG Smart Visu Server 1.0.804/1.0.830/1.0.832. This issue affects some unknown processing. The manipulation leads to backdoor. The attack needs to be approached locally. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 1.0.900 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.

item.title: CVE-2017-20084|2024-08-05T21:45:25.474Z -- jung -- smart%20visu%20server
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in JUNG Smart Visu Server 1.0.804/1.0.830/1.0.832 and classified as critical. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the component KNX Group Address. The manipulation leads to backdoor. Local access is required to approach this attack. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 1.0.900 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.

item.title: CVE-2017-20083|2024-08-05T21:45:25.257Z -- jung -- smart%20visu%20server
item.description: A vulnerability, which was classified as critical, was found in JUNG Smart Visu Server 1.0.804/1.0.830/1.0.832. Affected is an unknown function of the component SSH Server. The manipulation leads to backdoor. An attack has to be approached locally. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 1.0.900 is able to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affected component.
